summary: The Veterans Health Administration is the largest single provider of medical care to HIV infected individuals in the nation. VA medical centers in 2018 provided care to over 31,000 HIV-positive veterans. Those who receive health care before their infections progress have better health, longer lives, and a lower chance of transmitting HIV. Among other things, we found VA does not track whether HIV-positive veterans began...
title: VA Health Care: Improved Communication about Available Data Needed to Enhance the HIV Screening Process
